topic.title: Labor and Delivery Section - conformance rules

lines.i: This section SHALL contain information pertinent to the labor and delivery process and outcome (e.g. type of labor, method of delivery, membrane detail, placenta detail, admission reason, gestational age at delivery, fetal surveillance, labor complications, and delivery complications). This section shall include the following sections: Procedures and Interventions, Vital Signs, and Event Outcomes subsections.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.8"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:45)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="34079-4" Labor and delivery section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:44)
A code value that indicates the nature of the section - it is the labor and delivery section.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:46)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:47)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Labor and Delivery Process (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.31)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:48)
Onset of labor information is collected for a live birth certificate, but not for a fetal death report.
Contains exactly one [1..1] Onset of Labor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.32)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:50)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Labor and Delivery Procedure Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.7)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:449)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Mothers Vital Signs Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.14)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:45)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="34079-4" Labor and delivery section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:44)
A code value that indicates the nature of the section - it is the labor and delivery section.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:46)
The text entry is drawn from the structured content contained within the entries of this section. Text is required to provide human readible content.

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry (CONF:47)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Labor and Delivery Process (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.31)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entry (CONF:48)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Onset of Labor (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.32)
Onset of labor information is collected for a live birth certificate, but not for a fetal death report.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:50)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Labor and Delivery Procedure Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.7)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] component (CONF:449)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Mothers Vital Signs Section (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.14)
